document_data.name: The Hand
document_data.mainbody: '''The Hand''' was an evil adventuring group based in [[Voonlar]]. They had at least one encounter with the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]] during the latter part of [[Doust Sulwood]]'s time as the Lord of Shadowdale ([[1350 DR]]–[[1353 DR]]).
